conversion_verification.notes: Second image is a true 3D cutaway: walls have height and thickness, multiple faces are visible, interior volume reads as rooms, and the camera is elevated/angled rather than top-down.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong 3D extrusion with readable wall/floor separation and clean cutaway; minor simplification at some wall junctions and openings.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Overall layout matches (kitchen top-left, dining top-right, living right, stairs bottom-left, bathroom central). Some door/window counts/placements and opening orientations appear simplified relative to the 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture and fixtures included (kitchen run with stove/sink/cabinets, dining set, living seating + table/TV, toilet + sink, stairs). Bathroom appears incomplete/simplified (no clear shower/tub).

visual_clarity.notes: Clean presentation with distinct walls/floors and adequate lighting; no text/UI clutter. Minor softness/low-detail materials but geometry remains readable.

detected_errors.description: Door/window placements and/or swing/orientation do not fully match the 2D plan (some openings appear simplified or shifted).
Bathroom fixtures are simplified/incomplete compared to a typical full bath layout (missing shower/tub element).

summary: A clear true-3D cutaway with strong overall layout fidelity, but with minor mismatches/simplifications in openings and some interior fixture details.
